content: Can someone give this stream a description please
of all streams to not have a description... There description better be well formed. this is now a test of them using their vocabulary governance on themselves... :-)
I'm afraid I gave them one before I saw this post. And I wasn't even nasty...
You are assuming a vocab person created this - can you confirm that is true?
Can someone point me to the UTG entry for this description?
Is the stream limited to terminologies in FHIR? I thought all of the HL7 chat is now on this server, so wouldn't the stream also cover terminology discussions with regards to other HL7 standards?

Robert McClure said:

You are assuming a vocab person created this - can you confirm that is true?

There is no provenance record of who made the change. so there is no clear evidence... although there is signs in the text that would indicate the absence of vocab person involvement.
@Vassil Peytchev - added "and other HL7 standards"
I designed the MIF, so I count as an honorary vocab person, I think? :)
@Vassil Peytchev there's aspects of that change that are ambiguous. But at least with terminology, any differences are collapsing. It's all just terminology now (just about)
